version_description: Game of Thrones Beyond the Wall is now available worldwide!
Game of Thrones Beyond the Wall is now available worldwide!
Game of Thrones Beyond the Wall is now available worldwide!

Lord Commander, we have some new changes:
•Optimized Hero Arena- Challenge Passes will be consumed after you select an opponent. Added maps
•Added Legendary Event for Melisandre
•Added a subscription: “Grand Maester’s Guidance”
•Fine tuned text
•Improved UI displays

Lord Commander, we have some new changes:
•Optimized Hero Arena- Challenge Passes will be consumed after you select an opponent. Added maps
•Added Legendary Event for Melisandre
•Added a subscription: “Grand Maester’s Guidance”
•Fine tuned text
•Improved UI displays

Lord Commander, we have some new changes:
•Optimized Hero Arena- Challenge Passes will be consumed after you select an opponent. Added maps
•Added Legendary Event for Melisandre
•Added a subscription: “Grand Maester’s Guidance”
•Fine tuned text
•Improved UI displays

Lord Commander, we have some new changes:
•Armory: Assign an Instructor to unlock new abilities. Enhance Unit attributes through Tablets
•Uncharted Lands & Pendants: Explore unknown territories in search of Pendants to enhance Hero attributes
•Updated Lodge: Added affinity missions. Rewards include Affinity XP, Seals of Valor, Letters of Commendation etc. Added Commendation Shop
•Rookery: Receive Ravens with combat trainings from all regions. Pass trainings to obtain Tablets (used at Armory)
•Hero Arena: Challenge Passes now available for purchase
•Fine tuned text
•Improved UI displays

Lord Commander, new features include:

-Sparring Ground: Additional unit training to obtain Unit Ability Scroll shards

-Hunts: Additional Hero training to obtain Hero Ability Scroll shards

-Wildcard Items: Convert wildcard items to desired Seals of Valor or Hero Shards

Changes include:

-Improved Subscription services

-Improved Shop accessibility and simplified structure

-Wildcard Items: Convert wildcard items to desired Seals of Valor or Hero Shards

-Improved Shop accessibility and simplified structure

Lord Commander, new features include:
-Battalions: Join or create your own Battalion to play with friends and other players!
-Challenge Boss: Added rotating bosses, Monday to Friday
-Challenges: Added 20 additional stages
Changes include:
-Weirwood Forays: Chance to drop Elite Insignia shards. Added Patrols
-Lodge: Added “Claim All” button for Affinity rewards
-Chat: Tap another players avatar to view their profile

-Battalions: Join or create your own Battalion to play with friends and other players!
-Challenge Boss: Added rotating bosses, Monday to Friday
-Challenges: Added 20 additional stages

-Lodge: Added “Claim All” button for Affinity rewards

Lord Commander, new features include:
-Battalions: Join or create your own Battalion to play with friends and other players!
-Challenge Boss: Added rotating bosses, Monday to Friday
-Challenges: Added 20 additional stages
Changes include:
-Weirwood Forays: Chance to drop Elite Insignia shards. Added Patrols
-Lodge: Added “Claim All” button for Affinity rewards

Lord Commander, new features include:
-Legendary Events: Unlock Boss Challenges as you complete Legendary Event levels and gain extra training materials for Heroes.
-Gifts: Send free food daily to your Lord Commander friends
Changes include:
-Lodge: Added Patrols
-Ranging: Added Patrols
-Combat Speedup: Speed up Battles 3x
-Claim All: Button added to Hunts
-Tactic Card Filters: Search by type or star-rating

Lord Commander, new features include:

-Battalion vs. Battalion: Battle other Battalions to receive additional rewards

-Battalion Impeachment: Vote to remove Lord Commanders who have been offline for 7 consecutive days

-Reset Hero Progress

-Monthly Subscription: Receive the benefits of a weekly subscription for a lower price

Changes include:

-Challenges: Added an additional 30 stages

-Tactic Cards: Added 4 5* Tactic Cards and 18 4* Tactic Cards

Lord Commander, new changes include:
-Battalion: Added a new weekly reward at 25000 Battalion activity points
-Battalion Duel: Added a combat report page. Review results at specific battle points
-Patrols: Optimized the panel when required materials are insufficient to allow Patrols for resources when available
-Friend List: Added an online/offline timer and sorting of friends
…and we fixed some bugs and optimized other features.

Lord Commander, new changes include:
• Night’s Watch Recruitment (Heroes): Addition of Mayla - Daughter of the North, Tormund Giantsbane - Breaker of Ice, and Daenerys Targaryen - Protector of the Realm.
• Night’s Watch Recruitment (Units): Addition of the new Riverlands Units - Conspirator, Crossing Trooper and Seagard Infantry
